definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: mound;—´[[ס]] 2Sa 20:15 + 7 t.; [[סוֹלְלָה]] Da 11:15; pl. [[סׂלְלוֹת]] Je 32:24, Je 33:4.—´[[שָׁפַךְ ס]] [[עַל־הָעִיר]] cast up mound against the city , besieging it, 2Ki 19:32 = Is 37:33, Je 6:6, Ez Eze 4:2, Eze 26:8; c. [[אֶל]] 2Sa 20:15 (error for [[על]]); without [[על העיר]] Ez Eze 17:17, Eze 21:17, Da 11:15 without vb. Je 32:24, Je 33:4.
